text: Ricky Allan Siglar (born June 14, 1966 in Albuquerque, New Mexico) is a former American football offensive tackle who played for four teams in the NFL. He played college football at San Jose State University and junior college football at Arizona Western College. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Albuquerque, New Mexico Category:American football offensive tackles Category:Arizona Western Matadors football players Category:San Francisco 49ers players Category:Kansas City Chiefs players Category:New Orleans Saints players Category:Carolina Panthers players Category:San Jose State Spartans football players
title: Ricky Siglar
